r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - Fixed windows build - Changelog 2.3.0: - Added Yaf_Response::setHeader, getHeahder, setAllHeader, clearHeaders Methods - Added Yaf_Route::assemble. (Now you can assemble url via routes) - Fixed Segfault if a empty application.directory is set
